THE THEATRE OF THE WHOLE
WORLD: SET FORTH BY THAT
Excellent Geographer Abraham Ortelius.

LONDON,
Printed by IOHN NORTON; Printer to the Kings most excellent Maiestie in
Hebrew, Greeke, and Latine. 1606.

The sway, by Sea & Land, grat IAMES doth beare,
His Birth, His Bloud, These Kingdomes figure here:

But, were his seuerall vertues to be crown'd
A World, past thine, Ortelius, must be found.
